name: Equipment Ledger
query:
select
    IFNULL(eqmaint.posting_date, eqmaint.modified) as `Posting Date:Data:150`,
    eq.name as "Name:Link/Equipment:150",
    eq.status as "Equipment Status:Data:150",
    eq.item_code as "Item Code:Data:150",
    eq.location as "Location:Data:150",
    doctype.name as "doctype:Data:150",
    eqmaint.status as "Status:Data:150",
    eqmaint.name as "Reference:Dynamic Link/doctype:150"

from 
    `tabEquipment` eq,`tabEquipment Maintenance` eqmaint,`tabDocType` doctype
where
    eq.name = eqmaint.equipment and
    eq.name = %(equipment)s and
    doctype.name = 'Equipment Maintenance'
union
select
    IFNULL(eqprob.posting_date, eqprob.modified) as `Posting Date`,
    eq.name as "Name:Link/Equipment",
    eq.status as "Status:Data:150",
    eq.item_code as "Item Code:Data:150",
    eq.location as "Location:Data:150",
    doctype.name as "DocType:Data:150",
    eqprob.status as "Status:Select:150",
    eqprob.name as "Reference:Link/Problem Report:150"

from
    `tabEquipment` eq,`tabProblem Report` eqprob,`tabDocType` doctype
where
    eq.name = eqprob.equipment and
    eq.name = %(equipment)s and
    doctype.name = 'Problem Report'

union
select
    IFNULL(eqlog.posting_date, eqlog.modified) as `Posting Date`,
    eq.name as "Name:Link/Equipment",
    eq.status as "Status:Data:150",
    eq.item_code as "Item Code:Data:150",
    eq.location as "Location:Data:150",
    doctype.name as "DocType:Data:150",
    eqlog.status as "Status:Select:150",
    eqlog.name as "Reference:Link/Equipment Log:200"
    
from
    `tabEquipment` eq,`tabEquipment Log` eqlog,`tabDocType` doctype
where
    eq.name = eqlog.equipment and
    eq.name = %(equipment)s and
    doctype.name = 'Equipment Log'

union
select
    IFNULL(rf.posting_date, rf.modified) as `Posting Date`,
    eq.name as "Name:Link/Equipment",
    eq.status as "Status:Data:150",
    eq.item_code as "Item Code:Data:150",
    eq.location as "Location:Data:150",
    doctype.name as "DocType:Data:150",
    null as "Status:Select:150",
    rf.name as "Reference:Link/RFID Trace:200"
    
from
    `tabEquipment` eq,`tabRFID Trace` rf,`tabDocType` doctype
where
    eq.name = rf.equipment and
    eq.name = %(equipment)s and
    doctype.name = 'RFID Trace'

union
select
    IFNULL(mem.posting_date, mem.modified) as `Posting Date`,
    eq.name as "Name:Link/Equipment",
    eq.status as "Status:Data:150",
    eq.item_code as "Item Code:Data:150",
    eq.location as "Location:Data:150",
    doctype.name as "DocType:Data:150",
    mem.type as "Status:Select:150",
    mem.name as "Reference:Link/RFID Trace:200"
    
from
    `tabEquipment` eq,`tabManual Equipment Movement` mem,`tabDocType` doctype
where
    eq.name = mem.equipment and
    eq.name = %(equipment)s  and
    doctype.name = 'Manual Equipment Movement'
    order by `Posting Date:Data:150` desc
